dct_title_s: Rand McNally Popular Map of Colorado
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Includes table: "principal cities" of Colorado with population listed in the thousands.
dct_rights_sm: Images from the David Rumsey Map Center's general collections courtesy of Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
